      • getTarget

        public abstract PointMapItem getTarget()
        Responsible for returning the target associated with the active 5/9 line entity. Will return null if the target does not exist or has been removed.

      • getClosestFriendly

        public abstract PointMapItem getClosestFriendly()
        Returns the closes friendly associated with the target nine line.
        Returns:
        the point map item that is the closest friendly
